Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.common

Interface ActionListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Client
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UnityClientBehaviour
    public interface ActionListener
    Represents a handler that should listen for game requests.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void elapseAwaitingRequests()
      Elapses all awaiting requests, typically due to a timer running out.
      void onMulligan​(java.lang.String messageId, GameState state, java.util.List<Card> cards, int playerId)
      Requests a mulligan
      void onRequestAction​(java.lang.String messageId, GameState state, java.util.List<GameAction> actions)
      Requests a game action.

void elapseAwaitingRequests()

        Parameters:

        state - The game state

                int playerId)
        Requests a mulligan
        Parameters:
        messageId - The message ID
        state - The game state
        cards - The cards that can be discarded
        playerId - The player doing the discards
